comment: The circumference of a circle of radius ` R ` , defined as the limit as ` n ~~> +oo ` of the perimeter of an inscribed n-sided isogons, is ` ( ( 2 x. _pi ) x. R ) ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 10-Nov-2012.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2014.)
